description.content: The headless API is designed for implementing your own store frontend with the data of your store. You are able to call the Headless API directly from a web browser (such as within an SPA), or from a backend server, such as for in-game GUIs.

item.name: /accounts/:token
item.description: Gets the webstore associated with the provided identifier.

item.name: Fetch a webstore by its identifier

request.description: Gets the webstore associated with the provided identifier.

item.name: /accounts/:token/baskets
item.description: Creates a new basket for use during checkout.

request.description: Creates a new basket for use during checkout.

item.name: /accounts/:token/baskets/:basketIdent
item.description: Gets a basket associated with the provided identifier.

item.name: Fetch a basket from a webstore by its identifier

request.description: Gets a basket associated with the provided identifier.

item.name: /accounts/:token/baskets/:basketIdent/auth?returnUrl=:returnUrl
item.description: Fetches a basket's auth URL.

item.name: Fetch a basket from a webstore by its identifier

variable.description: The URL you would like to redirect the user to after successful basket authentication.

request.description: Fetches a basket's auth URL.

item.name: /accounts/:token/baskets/:basketIdent/coupons
item.description: Applies a creator code to a basket.

item.name: Apply a coupon to a basket.

request.description: Applies a creator code to a basket.

item.name: /accounts/:token/baskets/:basketIdent/coupons/remove
item.description: Removes a coupon code from a basket

item.name: Remove a coupon from the basket.

request.description: Removes a coupon code from a basket

item.name: /accounts/:token/baskets/:basketIdent/creator-codes
item.description: Applies a creator code to a basket.

item.name: Apply a creator code to a basket.

request.description: Applies a creator code to a basket.

item.name: /accounts/:token/baskets/:basketIdent/creator-codes/remove
item.description: Applies a creator code to a basket.

item.name: Remove a creator code from the basket.

request.description: Applies a creator code to a basket.

item.name: /accounts/:token/baskets/:basketIdent/giftcards
item.description: Applies a creator code to a basket.

item.name: Apply a gift card to a basket.

request.description: Applies a creator code to a basket.

item.name: /accounts/:token/baskets/:basketIdent/giftcards/remove
item.description: Removes a gift card from the basket.

item.name: Remove a gift card from the basket.

request.description: Removes a gift card from the basket.

item.name: /accounts/:token/categories
item.description: Gets all categories from a webstore. This does not include package information. To include package information, add `?includePackages=1` to the URL.

item.name: Gets all categories available in the webstore.

request.description: Gets all categories from a webstore. This does not include package information. To include package information, add `?includePackages=1` to the URL.

item.name: /accounts/:token/categories/:categoryId
item.description: Gets information about a category and returns the packages in that category.

item.name: Gets information about a specific category

variable.description: The ID of the category to fetch.

request.description: Gets information about a category and returns the packages in that category.

item.name: /accounts/:token/categories/:categoryId?includePackages=1
item.description: Gets information about a category and returns the packages in that category.

item.name: Gets information about a specific category, including all the packages in the category

variable.description: The ID of the category to fetch.

request.description: Gets information about a category and returns the packages in that category.

item.name: /accounts/:token/categories?includePackages=1
item.description: Gets all categories from a webstore including packages.

item.name: Gets a store's categories including all package information with them.

request.description: Gets all categories from a webstore including packages.

item.name: /accounts/:token/packages
item.description: Gets all packages from a webstore.

item.name: Fetch all packages from a webstore

request.description: Gets all packages from a webstore.

item.name: /accounts/:token/packages/:packageId
item.description: Gets a package from a webstore by ID.

item.name: Fetch a package from a webstore by its identifier

request.description: Gets a package from a webstore by ID.

item.name: /accounts/:token/packages?basketIdent=:basketIdent
item.description: Gets all packages from a webstore.

item.name: Fetch a package from a webstore by its identifier

request.description: Gets all packages from a webstore.

item.name: /accounts/:token/packages?ipAddress=:ipAddress
item.description: Gets all packages from a webstore.

item.name: Fetch a package from a webstore by its identifier

variable.description: An IP address can be provided with authenticated requests.

request.description: Gets all packages from a webstore.

item.name: /accounts/:token/packages?ipAddress=:ipAddress&basketIdent=:basketIdent
item.description: Gets all packages from a webstore.

item.name: Fetch a package from a webstore by its identifier

variable.description: An IP address can be provided with authenticated requests.

request.description: Gets all packages from a webstore.

item.name: /baskets/:basketIdent/packages
item.description: Add a package with the given ID to the basket.

item.name: Add a package to a basket

request.description: Add a package with the given ID to the basket.

item.name: /baskets/:basketIdent/packages/:packageId
item.description: Sets the quantity of the given item in the basket.

item.name: Updates the quantity of the given package in the basket. The user must be logged in before the quantity can be changed.

request.description: Sets the quantity of the given item in the basket.

item.name: /baskets/:basketIdent/packages/remove
item.description: Remove the given package ID from the basket.

item.name: Remove a package from a basket

request.description: Remove the given package ID from the basket.
